label: A3BC_hR5_146_b_a_a-001
title: $\gamma$-Ag$_{3}$SI (Low-Temperature) Structure
comments:
$\gamma$-Ag$_{3}$SI is the low temperature structure.  Above 157K it transforms into $\beta$-Ag$_{3}$SI, a variation of the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3C_cP5_221_a_c_b-001}{cubic perovskite ($E2_{1}$) structure}. 
 Space group $R3$ \#146 allows an arbitary placement of the origin of the $z$-axis.  We use this freedom to place a sulfur atom at the origin, $z_{2} = 0$.
